metadata.synopsis: AD for a mind flayer's memory imprint in the Tadpoling Centre, showing who they used to be when they entered the pod.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Tadpoling Centre (ReCon command "oe tc_teleport")- Interact with S_COL_TadpolingCentre_MemoryImprint_003_a49d018f-eede-4b58-932b-c3122881c689

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Desperation... pain... terror. Cultists raided his village - he was the sole survivor.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The device releases a stream of fragmented memories and emotions - all that remains of the pod inhabitant's former self.*

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *The device does not react to your touch or presence.*
